description:
An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drum, l`île de la neige. À l`assaut du sommet !
The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!
Yuki no Sumu Shima! Drum-Rocky o Nobore!
Заснеженный остров! Вверх по Барабанной Скале!
เกาะแห่งหิมะ ปีนเขาดรัมร๊อกกี้
雪の住む島! ドラムロッキーを登れ!
